import React, { useState } from "react"; import NetworkGraph from "../shared/NetworkGraph"; import ScanningOverlay from "../shared/ScanningOverlay"; import TheoryExplainer from "../shared/TheoryExplainer"; import AttentionVisualizer from "../shared/AttentionVisualizer"; import { mockCrimes, relatedCrimes, detectiveStoryCase, detectiveRelatedCrimes, } from "../../data/mockData"; /** * Enhanced Investigation Tab with Theory Explanations and Attention Visualization */ const InvestigationTabEnhanced = ({ selectedCrime, setSelectedCrime, isScanning, scanProgress, showResults, highlightedNodes, handleScan, graphNodes, graphEdges, setHighlightedNodes, setShowResults, }) => { const [showTheory, setShowTheory] = useState(false); const [showAttention, setShowAttention] = useState(false); const [useDetectiveCase, setUseDetectiveCase] = useState(true); // Use detective case or regular case const currentCase = useDetectiveCase ? detectiveStoryCase : selectedCrime; const currentRelated = useDetectiveCase ? detectiveRelatedCrimes : relatedCrimes; const handleDetectiveScan = () => { setSelectedCrime(detectiveStoryCase); handleScan(); // Auto-show theory and attention after scan setTimeout(() => { setShowTheory(true); setShowAttention(true); }, 3000); }; return (
